rules.description: Finder shortcuts (F2, enter, alt+q, (shift) delete, cmd + shift + s to hide, cmd + x to cut)
cmd + (shift) + tab --> right_ctrl + (shift) + tab, ctrl + tab --> Mission Control
left_ctrl + space, d to mouse-click, show-desktop, spotlight (if alone)
left_alt + q, a to cmd + q, h
left_alt + hl to cmd + [] (go back, forward)
Windows like word / line navigation (cmd + (shift) + left, right, Home, End)
Launch apps (alt + w,f,1 --> Finder, Firefox, iTerm) (ctrl + o --> HoudahSpot)
left_cmd to right_ctrl, right_ctrl + left_shift to left_cmd (for terminals)
